biblStruct.note: Samuil Micu Klein was a prolific translator of the Holy Fatherʾs writings. His actions were motivated by several factors, including literary, scientific, and theological. Samuil Micu Klein wished to make the essential sources of patristic literature available to his contemporaries by preparing a coherent Philokalia. In this paper, we present Samuil Micu Klein's work as a translator and reproduce our interpretative transcription of a fragment from his translation of Saint Ephrem the Syrianʾs Homily: Cuvânt de preafrumosul Iosif.
